evaluation_meta.evaluation_scope: Technical feasibility, user impact, performance, risk-benefit analysis
evaluation_meta.success_criteria: Comprehensive go/no-go recommendations with detailed justification

E01.name: Technical Feasibility Evaluation
E01.deliverable: Technical feasibility report with implementation complexity assessment
critical_questions: Can the 8-week timeline realistically deliver 220 hours of development?
Are the technical dependencies properly identified and mitigated?
Is the modular architecture technically sound and implementable?
What are the highest technical risks and blockers?

E02.name: User Impact Assessment
E02.scope: User experience, learning curve, compatibility, productivity
E02.deliverable: User impact analysis with UX preservation validation
critical_questions: Will users experience disruption during the migration?
Is backward compatibility truly preserved 100%?
What is the learning curve for new features?
How will productivity be affected during transition?

E03.name: Performance Validation
E03.scope: Token reduction, response time, context optimization, parallel execution
E03.deliverable: Performance improvement validation with benchmarking plan
critical_questions: Are the 30% token reduction claims realistic?
Can 20% response time improvement be achieved?
Is parallel execution properly architected?
What are the performance measurement methodologies?

E04.name: Risk-Benefit Analysis
E04.scope: Comprehensive risk assessment, mitigation strategies, ROI analysis
E04.deliverable: Risk-benefit matrix with mitigation strategy evaluation
critical_questions: What are the hidden risks not addressed in the blueprint?
Are rollback procedures realistic and tested?
Is the risk-benefit ratio favorable?
What are the failure modes and recovery plans?

E05.name: Implementation Complexity
E05.scope: Development effort, integration challenges, technical debt
E05.deliverable: Implementation complexity assessment with effort validation
critical_questions: Is the 220-hour estimate realistic for the scope?
What integration challenges are underestimated?
Will technical debt increase or decrease?
Are the resource requirements adequate?

E06.name: Security Impact Evaluation
E06.scope: Security implications, prompt injection resistance, validation
critical_questions: Does the modular architecture introduce security vulnerabilities?
Are prompt injection defenses adequate?
Is input validation comprehensive?
What are the authentication/authorization implications?

E07.name: Quality Assurance Strategy
E07.scope: Testing approach, TDD practicality, quality gates
E07.deliverable: QA strategy evaluation with testing framework assessment
critical_questions: Is universal TDD enforcement practical?
Are quality gates properly designed?
Can 90%+ coverage be maintained?
What are the testing automation requirements?

E08.name: Migration Risk Assessment
E08.scope: Migration-specific risks, data safety, transition challenges
E08.deliverable: Migration risk analysis with transition strategy evaluation
critical_questions: Are phase transition risks properly managed?
Can <2s rollback be guaranteed?
What are the data corruption risks?
How realistic are the emergency procedures?

E09.name: Community Adoption Potential
E09.scope: Broader community impact, documentation clarity, maintainability
E09.deliverable: Community adoption assessment with growth potential analysis
critical_questions: Will the community adopt the new architecture?
Is documentation sufficient for new users?
Are contribution barriers lowered or raised?
What is the long-term maintainability outlook?

E10.name: Cost-Benefit Validation
E10.scope: Total implementation cost, productivity gains, ROI calculation
critical_questions: What is the true total cost of implementation?
Are productivity gain estimates realistic?
When will ROI be achieved?
What are the opportunity costs?

evaluation_execution.batch_strategy: Parallel execution in 3 batches for optimal performance
evaluation_execution.quality_requirements: Each agent must provide specific, actionable recommendations
evaluation_execution.deliverable_standards: Evidence-based analysis with clear go/no-go rationale

evaluation_criteria.technical_soundness: Architecture feasibility, implementation realism, performance claims
evaluation_criteria.user_value: UX preservation, productivity improvement, learning curve management
evaluation_criteria.risk_management: Risk identification, mitigation adequacy, rollback reliability
evaluation_criteria.resource_realism: Timeline feasibility, effort estimation, resource availability
evaluation_criteria.strategic_alignment: Community fit, maintainability, future evolution capability

key_findings: Timeline underestimated by 100-125% (8 weeks → 16-18 weeks required)
Architecture technically sound with exceptional ROI potential (500-800%)
User support requirements 3x higher than estimated
Performance claims achievable but need conservative targets
Community adoption potential high with proper strategy
critical_concerns: Migration risks inadequately assessed and mitigated
Universal TDD enforcement overly ambitious without phased approach
Documentation complexity may impact user adoption without enhanced navigation
implementation_recommendations: Extend timeline to 16-18 weeks minimum for quality implementation
Implement comprehensive security framework as non-negotiable requirement
Create phased QA approach over 12 months instead of immediate universal TDD
Develop enhanced user support and training programs (120-150 hours)
Establish realistic rollback procedures with proper time expectations
Invest in community strategy and engagement infrastructure
alternative_approaches: Minimum viable approach: Focus only on core performance optimizations (6-8 weeks, $120-150K)
Phased rollout: Implement basic improvements first, advanced features later (20-24 weeks, $180-220K)
Community-first: Prioritize community infrastructure and gradual feature introduction (12-16 weeks, $160-200K)
